sourcesContent:
// Mock data for a detailed NGO profile, similar to Pratham Books on give.do
const ngoDetailMock = {
  id: "pratham-books",
  name: "Pratham Books",
  logo: "https://give.do/static/img/logos/IU6/2dd383e2-8fe7-4dc9-a564-57ffadc7b74e.png",
  badges: ["FCRA", "80G", "12A", "CSR-1"],
  transparency: "Silver Certified 2023",
  mission: "Aims to create and publish affordable books enhancing children's reading skills, fluency, and overall learning outcomes.",
  primarySectors: ["Education", "Child & Youth Development", "Technology", "Recycling", "Skill Development", "Media & Awareness"],
  secondarySectors: ["Self-run Learning Centre", "Informal Education", "Teacher Training", "Formal Education", "Child Rights", "Girl Child", "Scholarships"],
  financials: {
    years: [2019, 2020, 2021, 2022, 2023, 2024],
    income: [120000000, 140000000, 160000000, 180000000, 155140920, 0],
    expenses: [110000000, 130000000, 150000000, 170000000, 197452080, 0],
    nonProgram: 21155580,
    program: 176296500
  },
  geographies: ["Bangalore", "Karnataka", "Delhi"],
  programs: [
    { name: "Donate a Book", img: "", desc: "" },
    { name: "Story Cards", img: "", desc: "" },
    { name: "Library in a Classroom", img: "", desc: "" },
    { name: "Story Weaver", img: "", desc: "" },
    { name: "Reading Champions", img: "", desc: "" }
  ],
  impactMetrics: [
    "53K Stories on the Platform",
    "24M Reads",
    "335 Languages",
    "164,500+ Users",
    "359,500+ Stories Listened",
    "494,700+ Calls Received",
    "60114 Children Reached",
    "Home Book Sets- 24,472, Libraries Set Up-1204",
    "Teachers Trained-1315"
  ],
  leadership: [
    { name: "Bijal Vaccharajani", role: "Commissioning Editor", linkedin: "https://www.linkedin.com/in/bijal-vachharajani-9a27812b/" },
    { name: "Purvi Shah", role: "Senior Director-StoryWeaver & Strategy", linkedin: "https://www.linkedin.com/in/purvi-shah-31873a5" },
    { name: "Himanshu Giri", role: "CEO", linkedin: "https://www.linkedin.com/in/himanshu-giri-98035021" },
    { name: "Sandhya Taksale", role: "Senior Editor", linkedin: "https://www.linkedin.com/in/sandhya-taksale-31940647/" },
    { name: "Pragya Thakur", role: "Consultant-Finance & Compliance", linkedin: "" }
  ],
  orgStrength: 8,
  orgStructure: "Yes",
  registration: {
    pan: "AAATP7221N",
    regNo: "BNG(U)-JNR-IV-490-2003-04",
    csr: "CSR00005884",
    g80: "AAATP7221NF20126",
    a12: "AAATP7221NE20045",
    fcra: "094421302"
  },
  about: "Pratham Books has motivated over 5700 reading champions who conducted more than 6300 storytelling sessions in 26 languages.",
  impact: "Pratham Books has motivated over 5700 reading champions who conducted more than 6300 storytelling sessions in 26 languages.",
  vision: "A Book in Every Child's Hand",
  address: "House No. 621, Second Floor, 5th Main, OMBR Layout, Banaswadi, Bangalore, Karnataka",
  offices: ["Bangalore", "Delhi"],
  type: "Non-profit",
  subType: "Trust",
  website: "https://prathambooks.org/",
  socials: {
    youtube: "https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzv3GMmBgvJ_LLLVBQF5NXQ",
    linkedin: "https://www.linkedin.com/company/pratham-books/",
    facebook: "https://facebook.com/prathambooks",
    instagram: "https://instagram.com/pratham.books",
    twitter: "https://twitter.com/prathambooks"
  },
  tech: {

    financial: true,
    beneficiary: true
